casebody.data:
No. 09-11255. Bruce Pettiford, Petitioner v. David W. Pitkins, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Laurel Highlands, et al. 562 U.S. 870, 131 S. Ct. 169,

178 L. Ed. 2d 100,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6577. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
